analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/44/0x74fc42895c70be48e290504c50682cf2c9af5b8e.sol#289-291):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(this) > 0 (/unique_chucks/44/0x74fc42895c70be48e290504c50682cf2c9af5b8e.sol)
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/44/0x74fc42895c70be48e290504c50682cf2c9af5b8e.sol)
	- token.transferOwnership(beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/44/0x74fc42895c70be48e290504c50682cf2c9af5b8e.sol)
	External calls sending eth:
	- beneficiary.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/44/0x74fc42895c70be48e290504c50682cf2c9af5b8e.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleFinished (/unique_chucks/44/0x74fc42895c70be48e290504c50682cf2c9af5b8e.sol)

Crowdsale.purchase (/unique_chucks/44/0x74fc42895c70be48e290504c50682cf2c9af5b8e.sol#245-282) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/44/0x74fc42895c70be48e290504c50682cf2c9af5b8e.sol#275-277)

Crowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/44/0x74fc42895c70be48e290504c50682cf2c9af5b8e.sol#289-291) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/44/0x74fc42895c70be48e290504c50682cf2c9af5b8e.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/44/0x74fc42895c70be48e290504c50682cf2c9af5b8e.sol#289-291):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(this) > 0 (/unique_chucks/44/0x74fc42895c70be48e290504c50682cf2c9af5b8e.sol)
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/44/0x74fc42895c70be48e290504c50682cf2c9af5b8e.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- refundOpen (/unique_chucks/44/0x74fc42895c70be48e290504c50682cf2c9af5b8e.sol)
